install.name: The Flash Module
install.author: Michael Carico
install.description: Display Flash (SWF) file in a module.

param.name: fm_path
param.label: File Path
param.description: Relative path to the SWF file.

param.name: fm_name
param.label: Object Name / ID
param.description: Identifies the Flash movie to the host environment.

param.name: fm_version
param.label: Flash Version
param.description: Verions of the Flash Player required to play the SWF. When possible, the lastest version of the selected player is used.

param.name: fm_quality
param.label: Quality
param.description: Quality setting to use in the Flash Player.

param.name: fm_loop
param.label: Loop
param.description: Specifies whether the movie repeats indefinitely or stops when it reaches the last frame.

param.name: fm_wmode
param.label: Window Mode
param.description: Sets the Window Mode property of the Flash movie for transparency, layering, and positioning in the browser.

param.name: fm_usejs
param.label: Display using JavaScript?
param.description: If this is set to YES, this will display the SWF using Javascript (which will 'fix' IE). If this is set to NO, then the SWF is displayed inline.

param.name: fm_noscript
param.label: NOSCRIPT Display
param.description: If Javascript is not detected, what should the module display (No-Flash HTML or FLASH Movie)?

param.name: fm_noflash
param.label: No Flash HTML
param.description: HTML to display if Flash is not detected and the NOSCRIPT Display is set to No-Flash HTML.
